ygData.subject: Re: PET COMMANDS
ygData.msgSnippet: They re in the everquest_manual.txt file in your everquest directory. /pet sit down stand up attack back off guard me guard here as you where
ygData.messageBody:
They're in the everquest_manual.txt file in your \everquest\ directory.

/pet
sit down
stand up
attack
back off
guard me
guard here
as you where <- I've never noticed that do anything.

be _sure_ you /pet follow me after you tell it to sit, as it will not get up and follow you unless you do. Thus, you could lose your pet, especially in a big zone.

~Mysk
----- Original Message -----
From: Mata
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 10:47 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] PET COMMANDS


Does anyone know a good web site or where I can find a list of the commands for your Skeleton??? and how do you make them use a weapon? Just give it to them??? Is it better to give them a weapon for damage purposes?
